0: Story highlights The plane was flying from Johannesburg to London NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A second man, who was hiding in the undercarriage of the plane, was injured NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR (CNN) A stowaway on a British Airways jet was found dead after falling on a roof as the plane approached London Heathrow Airport, authorities said Friday. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR It's unclear whether the man had crouched in the wheel well, a common hiding place for stowaways. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The plane was flying from Johannesburg to London when the man fell and landed above a business in Richmond, southwest London. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Airline tracking website FlightAware.com lists British Airways Flight 54 as a Boeing 747.
